data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Phan, Quoc Toan, Sasamoto, Akihiko, Hayashi, Fumio (2015): Description of two new species of the genus Devadatta from northern Vietnam and central Laos (Odonata: Devadattidae). Zootaxa 3941 (3): 414-420, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3941.3.7
